Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Butch Henry
Dear Sir,
Butch Henry has problems at AA Reading Phillies!
He has an ERA of 5.88, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director

a promotion wouldn't hurt.
